net.openalp.core
Class Grammar

java.lang.Object
  net.openalp.core.Grammar

public class Grammar
extends java.lang.Object

The heart of OpenALP. The grammar wraps the graph and provides functions for adding and checking grammar.

Returns:

parse

public boolean parse(java.lang.String sentance)
Parses a sentance, adding it to the grammar if it does not exist.

Parameters:
sentance - The sentance to parse.
Returns:
true if the sentance is already valid, false if new paths were created.

addPath

public void addPath(Sentance tokens)
Adds the given tokens to the grammar, creating as few nodes as possible. It works by matching as many tokens as possible then when it finds a non-matching token it creates the shortest chain possible to re-attach to the graph.

Parameters:
tokens - Tokenized sentance to add.
